Uses of Package
lumis.portal.bigdata.query

  • Packages that use lumis.portal.bigdata.query 
    Package Description
    lumis.doui.search  
    lumis.portal.bigdata
    Provides big data related operations.
    lumis.portal.bigdata.elasticsearch
    lumis.portal.bigdata implementation for using Elasticsearch.
    lumis.portal.bigdata.query
    Interfaces and classes used for performing a query in IBigDataRepository (more specifically in an IBigDataSearcher).
    lumis.search.lucene  
  • Classes in lumis.portal.bigdata.query used by lumis.doui.search 
    Class and Description
    HighlightConfig
    A search highlight configuration.
    ISearchHit
    An item of a ISearchResults object.
    SearchQuery
    Represents search criteria used to find matching information by a searcher.
    SearchQuerySort
    Search sort definition.

    AutoCompleteSuggestionConfig
    Auto complete suggestion configuration.
    ISearchResults
    Represents a collection of hits returned by a query execution.

    Represents search criteria used to find matching information by a searcher.

  • Classes in lumis.portal.bigdata.query used by lumis.portal.bigdata.query 
    Class and Description
    AutoCompleteSuggestionConfig
    Auto complete suggestion configuration.
    FieldPresenceClause
    ISearchQueryFilter that checks whether a given field is present or not, accordingly to the chosen operator.
    A field is present if a given document has it and it has a non-null value.
    The default operator is FieldPresenceClause.Operator.PRESENT.
    FieldPresenceClause.Operator
    The available operators for this clause.
    HighlightConfig
    A search highlight configuration.
    ISearchHit
    An item of a ISearchResults object.
    ISearchQueryFilter
    A filter for a search query.
    SearchFieldClause
    A search query clause used by a searcher to search content.
    SearchFieldClause.Operator
    Supported operators.
    SearchFilterGroup
    Allows the creation of composite filters by grouping them together and using a logical operator to join them.
    SearchFilterGroup.Operator
    Supported grouping operators.
    SearchQuery
    Represents search criteria used to find matching information by a searcher.
    SearchQuerySort
    Search sort definition.
    SearchQuerySort.Order
    The sort orders.
  • Classes in lumis.portal.bigdata.query used by lumis.search.lucene 
    Class and Description
    ISearchHit
    An item of a ISearchResults object.
